title: Tensei Shite Shota Oji Ni Natta Ken Hijiri Ha, Katsute No Deshi Ni Ha Zettai Ni Baretaku Na I Ken Jin Kikan
alternative_title: 転生してショタ王子になった剣聖は、かつての弟子には絶対にバレたくないっ ; El Maestro de la Espada reencarna como un pequeño príncipe. ¡Su Antiguo Discípulo ahora es su tutor! ; Reincarnated. The Sword Saint Who Became A Shorty Prince To His Former Disciples ~ I Don't Want My Former Disciples To Find Out
status: 転生してショタ王子になった剣聖は、かつての弟子には絶対にバレたくないっ ; El Maestro de la Espada reencarna como un pequeño príncipe. ¡Su Antiguo Discípulo ahora es su tutor! ; Reincarnated. The Sword Saint Who Became A Shorty Prince To His Former Disciples ~ I Don't Want My Former Disciples To Find Out
description:
Description :
        Sword Saint Brise saved the country with his unique swordsmanship.At the end of his magnificent life, he is reincarnated as the country's youngest prince, still retaining his memories.He seeks freedom again and aspires to enter the elementary school of knight school.Even though he is an invincible swordsman, he unexpectedly fails! “I came to get you.”He looks like a child, but inside he's an invincible former swordsman.In his reincarnation, he is picked up by his former disciple!?
